sect2.para: Is the file that specifices how to your environment will function.

sect2.title: Create /etc/profile
sect2.para: Now we will create the profile file for use with our system:

screen.userinput:
cat > ${CLFS}/etc/profile<< "EOF" # /etc/profile
# Set the initial path export PATH=/bin:/usr/bin
if [ `id -u` -eq 0 ] ; then PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin unset HISTFILE fi
# Setup some environment variables. export USER=`id -un` export LOGNAME=$USER export HOSTNAME=`/bin/hostname` export HISTSIZE=1000 export HISTFILESIZE=1000 export PAGER='/bin/more ' export EDITOR='/bin/vi' export INPUTRC=/etc/inputrc
# End /etc/profile EOF
